meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>fat</kanji> on an animal's <kanji>body</kanji> is called <vocabulary>fatty meat</vocabulary>. Some people really like to eat it and others really like to hate it.
readingMnemonic:
The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You haven't learned this reading for 脂 yet, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

Mmm, all that <vocabulary>fatty meat</vocabulary>. Think about fatty meat on your own body. If you have a lot of fatty meat, then you need a way to support said fatty meat. To do that, you would use <reading>a bra</reading> (あぶら).
